sentences.en: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.cn: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.en: Birds realized the transition from reptile to flight by jumping.
sentences.cn: 鸟类依靠跳跃实现了从爬行动物到飞行动物的转变.

sentences.en: Even police car sirens couldn't scare the big reptile off the road.
sentences.cn: 甚至连警车鸣笛都无法把这只庞然的爬虫类动物从路中吓跑.

sentences.en: In comparison with the mammal, the ordinary reptile is altogether reckless of its offspring.
sentences.cn: 和哺乳动物比起来, 一般的爬行动物对它们的后代简直是太漠不关心了.

sentences.en: Lizard is a small creature with four legs, a sort of reptile.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴是有四条腿的小动物, 一种爬行类动物.

sentences.en: Mammals arose from a fairly primitive reptile in the Mesozoic era.
sentences.cn: 哺乳类起源于中生代宛若原始的爬虫类.

sentences.en: New reptile surveys are revealing the fragile nature of many reptile populations.
sentences.cn: 新的爬行动物调查显示很多爬行动物天生脆弱.

sentences.en: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.cn: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.en: Robert Jordan saw his eyes were yellow as a cat's and flat as a reptile's.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·乔丹看到他眼睛象猫眼睛那样黄,象爬虫的眼睛那样呆滞.

sentences.en: She started my reptile education at the boa constrictor cage.
sentences.cn: 她在大王蟒蛇的笼子前开始给我讲起了爬行动物知识.

sentences.en: So you should not be surprised to see someone keep a reptile as a pet.
sentences.cn: 所以,你不必惊奇有人养了一只爬行动物作为宠物.

sentences.en: Strictly speaking, a slow - worm is a kind of reptile.
sentences.cn: 严格地说, 蛇晰是一种爬行动物.

sentences.en: The frog is not a true reptile.
sentences.cn: 青蛙并非真正的爬行动物.

sentences.en: The land is teeming with reptile life.

sentences.en: The sea turtle is the largest reptile in the aquarium.
sentences.cn: 海龟是现今海洋世界中躯体最大的爬行动物.

sentences.en: They attracted the attention of every bird within eyeshot, every reptile not yet asleep.
sentences.cn: 它们就把所有目力见得着的鸟儿,和所有还没入蛰的爬虫, 都引得注意起来.

sentences.en: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.cn: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。
